adnFirstRunHideAllAdsDescription.message: 隐藏由你的筛选器列表标记的广告
adnFirstRunHideAllAdsDescription.description: English: Firstrun.html -> hide Ads in your selected filter lists

adnFirstRunClickingAdsDescription.message: 访问由你的筛选器列表标记的广告
adnFirstRunClickingAdsDescription.description: English: Firstrun.html -> register visits on Ads found via your filter lists

adnFirstRunBlockingMalwareDescription.message: 优化设定以屏蔽恶意软件和隐形的用户追踪 (更改)
adnFirstRunBlockingMalwareDescription.description: English: Firstrun.html -> optimize your settings to protect against malware and non-visual trackers (customize)

adnNotificationActivateBlocking.message: 请启用“屏蔽恶意软件”功能

adnNotificationActivateEasyList.message: 请启用Easy List 筛选列表
adnNotificationActivateEasyList.description: English: Notifications -> Activate the EasyList filter

adnNotificationDisableAdBlocker.message: 请停用其它广告屏蔽软件
adnNotificationDisableAdBlocker.description: English: Notifications -> Please disable other ad blocker

adnFoundOn.description: English: Vault.html -> inspected Ad -> FOUND ON

adnPausedOnPage.description: English: Menu->display when paused on page/site

adnNotHiding.description: English: Menu->display when not hiding Ads

adnShowingRecentAds.message: 没有在本页收集到广告 (显示最近的)
adnShowingRecentAds.description: shown in menu when only 'recent' Ads are shown

adnClearConfirm.message: 这操作会永久移除你全部已保存的广告

adnMenuClearAds.message: 与浏览器记录清除广告

adnMenuHideBadge.message: 隐藏图标上的广告数目

hidingAdsPrompt.message: 隐藏由你的筛选器列表标记的广告
hidingAdsPrompt.description: English: Hide Ads identified by your chosen filter lists

clickingAdsPrompt.message: 点击由你的筛选器列表标记的广告
clickingAdsPrompt.description: English: Click Ads identified by your chosen filter lists

blockingMalwarePrompt.message: 屏蔽恶意软件和非可视的网络跟踪器
blockingMalwarePrompt.description: English: Protect your browser from malware and non-visual trackers

parseTextAdsPrompt.message: 当可行时捕捉文字广告
parseTextAdsPrompt.description: English: Capture text-only Ads when possible

settingsIconBadgePrompt.message: 在图标上显示已找到的广告数目
settingsIconBadgePrompt.description: English: Show the number of found Ads on the icon

noIncomingCookiesPrompt.message: 忽略由点击广告产生的 cookie
noIncomingCookiesPrompt.description: English: Ignore cookies returned with clicks

noOutgoingCookiesPrompt.message: 不要发送 cookie 访问
noOutgoingCookiesPrompt.description: English: Don't send cookies on visits

noOutgoingUserAgentPrompt.message: 当访问广告时隐藏浏览器识别符
noOutgoingUserAgentPrompt.description: English: Hide user-agent header on visits

noOutgoingRefererPrompt.message: 当访问广告时隐藏引用页面
noOutgoingRefererPrompt.description: English: Hide referring page on visits

respectDNTPrompt.description: English: Make exceptions for non-tracking Ads

extShortDesc.message: 一款被设计为对抗来自广告网络追踪的扩展
extShortDesc.description: for the chrome web store: must be 132 characters or less

whitelistPageName.description: appears as tab name in dashboard
